description: Upper Sunbury Road: Boundary/Retaining Wall:Brief: The boundary/retaining wall to Spring Grove was originally constructed in the mid-19th century, it is approx. 1.5 m high and is, in parts, leaning towards the main road. Areas of the wall have been replaced/repaired in the past but two areas look the most precarious at present, these two sections are being considered for replacement.In order for the builders to safely remove these sections of walling & carry out a reduction dig of the soil area, some trees/stumps will require removal.Item/Species.
